column2: ENGLISH
Your host and guards arrive, looking to lock you away in chains for their own benefit.
It seems the Avatar has taken... poorly to your choice. Swiftly defeating your guards, [From.GetSheHe] leaves you wounded but alive.
I refuse to be imprisoned.
They'll pay for this.
[Root.Location.GetName] jylland
Fire for guardian!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has fired an event. Capital [Root.Capital.GetName]
Trigger for strong. Test son's name [From.GetFirstName]
Should add brave because viking.
[Root.GetFirstName] test for own name
guardian has reacted
1+ martial
After many years of roaming the earth and maintain the balance, age has finally caught up with me.
I think I can see the Spirit World!
Birth of the new Avatar
It's me

News is quickly spreading that Avatar [From.GetFirstName] has perished. Just as the old Avatar has left this world, in sixteen years it is expected a new Avatar will emerge, but such interregnums have often been fraught with trouble, chaos and war.
Such uncertain times...
After 16 years, the elders of my nation has declared me the new Avatar.
I shall do my best.

After sixteen years since the last Avatar perished, a successor has finally been identified as Avatar [From.GetFirstName]. Whether [From.GetSheHe] proves to be worthy of the title, time will tell, but for now what is certain is that the Avatar will set out to master the four elements once more.
Finally.
Birth of the new Avatar
It's me
Birth of the new Avatar
It's me
Birth of the new Avatar
It's me
Birth of the new Avatar
It's me
This character is ruled by more able men.
Waterbender
This character controls the element of water.
Earthbender
This character controls the element of earth.
Firebender
This character controls the element of fire.
Airbender
This character controls the element of air.
Incompetent Bender
This person has either just started bending or is simply not as gifted as others.
Competent Bender
This person has had some training in bending and is mildly gifted. They can stand their own in a fight.
Powerful Bender
This person is likely well-known as one of the strongest benders in their village, city or tribe.
Master Bender
Truly a master at bending, this person is not easily beaten in a one-on-one fight.
Legendary Bender
This person is among the most gifted handful of benders on the planet. The Avatar is not able to reach this level in bending because it requires too much specialisation into one element.
Avatar [From.GetFirstName]
Death of Avatar [From.GetFirstName]
[From.GetFirstName] has exposed [From.GetHerselfHimself] on the battlefield and it is as if [From.GetSheHe] is brought to me on a silver platter. The moment is most opportune!
Fire is power! Strength is all I need to persevere!
The wind is freedom. I shall decide what happens in this battle.
The waters are ever-changing under the eternal Moon.
The very earth under my feet shall obey me.
I shall draw my weapon and my enemy will know my strength!
A wise fighter knows when it is brave to enter a battle and when it is foolish - today is the latter.

[From.GetFirstName]'s strong will and determination allows [From.GetHerHim] to quickly overpower me with a flurry of flames. I try my best to think of a way to counter my opponent but I must not ponder, it is now or never!

After masterfully evading several attacks, [From.GetFirstName] has stopped avoiding and is now facing me! A single soaring wind blast is heading my way. I must now be decisive: what is my next action?

Spikes of ice and liquid surges home in on me from [From.GetFirstName], whose determination is not easily dissolved. The clear water is elegantly flowing around [From.GetFirstName] and [From.GetSheHe] is preparing for an attack. Now is the chance!
Though not a bender, my opponent [From.GetFirstName] should not be underestimated. After a short but intense dance, [From.GetSheHe] allows me to respond in kind.

My opponent [From.GetFirstName] makes the ground beneath me roar like a mighty lion elephant and shards of rock rise to do [From.GetHerHis] bidding. [From.GetFirstName] makes a move. This presents an opening to me and I must decide quickly.
Hit the most vital organs!
Strike the torso region!
Strike the limbs!
Flee!
I must maintain balance and choose which element I shall use.

I look in amazement as the battle has caused more damage to the once-beautiful vista than it has to me. My opponent's relentless use of force has made [From.GetHerHim] forget to maintain [From.GetHerHis] defences. You now have an opening in which to act!

[From.GetFirstName] is an apt opponent and [From.GetSheHe] uses sudden stealthy strikes and quickly evades any of the attacks I throw at [From.GetHerHim], as befits an airbender. Suddenly however, my opponent makes a poor judgement call and I have an opening to respond!
The earth has been difficult to stand on, both from [From.GetFirstName]'s attacks and attempts to throw me off balance. As [From.GetFirstName] prepares another attack I see an opening!

My clothes are soaked and I'm freezing up. The floor is slippery, both from the muddied earth and the random bits of ice lying around. [From.GetFirstName]'s attacks continue. As [From.GetSheHe]  takes a fraction too long drawing water from [From.GetHerHis] waterpack I have a chance!

[From.GetFirstName] has closed in on me and metal is now clashing a mere arm's length from my face. My opponent is not to be called an unskilled fighter, sustaining my onslaught for so long. It can't last, however, as you manage to sense an opportune moment at which to act!
Hit the most vital organs!
Strike the torso region!
Strike the limbs!
Flee!
Something
Something
The heat is too strong and [From.GetFirstName]'s formidable attacks have pushed me back. As my defences were down [From.GetSheHe] strikes a last time and the lights fade.
The wind are strong and [From.GetFirstName]'s formidable attacks have thrown me up and down against the ground. As I land a last time I feel a blinding pain at the back of my head.
[From.GetFirstName] has finally got the advantage and my lack of attacks has left me open to attacks. One final attack from [From.GetFirstName] sends a large boulder against me...

My clothes are soaked and a chill has finally reached my bones. [From.GetFirstName] sets [From.GetHerHis] final attack in and body is locked in frozen water. My arms can't move and everything is cold.

[From.GetFirstName] is clearly used to close quarters combat and my attacks find no openings in [From.GetHerHis] defence. After a losing battle, [From.GetFirstName]'s club finally meets my head and I fall into darkness.
This is the end...
A long battle has raged between us. My attack has been blocked by my opponent and I feel completely drained of energy. [From.GetFirstName] sees my wavering concentration and strikes me to the ground.

Every single one of my attacks against [From.GetFirstName] have been avoided and several of [From.GetHerHis] attacks have hit me. Suddenly I feel my feet being swept off the ground. The world spin once or twice and I suddenly hit the ground.

Hindering and launching my own attacks has been exhausting but [From.GetFirstName] is unstoppable. The ground has been shaken under me and suddenly a rock roughly the size of my head is coming towards me. I get thrown back by its impact and land on my back.

A fast series of water and ice spears have been thrown at me. I've avoided most, and as I launch my own attack [From.GetFirstName] pushes me down with a large wave from the excess of water the battle has left behind on the ground.
[From.GetFirstName] relentlessly attacks me and I can barely manage a defence. Even though I try my best, I notice a quick punch to my face too late and I fall back.
[From.GetFirstName] now has me...
The quick array of small bursts of fire suddenly stops and I see [From.GetFirstName] flee from the fight!
After having avoided and hindered my attacks, I notice [From.GetFirstName] vanish in a cloud of dust!
It seems my attacks has been successful. [From.GetFirstName] has dropped [From.GetHerHis] attacks and is now fleeing the battle!
Even after all the attacks of [From.GetFirstName], suddenly [From.GetFirstName] has turned [From.GetHerHis] back to me and is running away!
My superiority has finally resulted in [From.GetFirstName] turning [From.GetHerHis] back to me and running away!
Fear me!
[From.GetFirstName] has finally put me on my back. The fury is burning in [From.GetHerHis] eyes and I have a choice!
I'm begging you!
[From.GetFirstName] is laying on the floor is begging for [From.GetHerHis] life. What should I do?
I accept and you can go!
I spare you, but you wil be my prisoner.
I decline and this ends here!
[From.GetFirstName] is before me lifeless. A terrible ending to the battle.
It should never have happened like this...
[From.GetFirstName] has been incapacitated and now I can put [From.GetHerHim] in my custody!
This should end this!
You charge ahead!
You beg for mercy and for your opponent to let you go.
A quick succession of strikes to your enemy's vital regions and head would decide the battle quickly, but you open yourself up to a hazardous counterattack.

column1: EVTTOOLTIPBduel.1;"A routine strike at the torso region would be an all-round safe move; both for you and your opponent as it is easily anticipated and recovered from.";;;;;;;;;x

column2: If you attempt to cripple your opponent by hitting their arms and legs, you can end the fight without blood being spilled. However, it is considered very risky with a small chance of success.

column1: EVTTOOLTIPDduel.1;"Whether by necessity or as part of a clever tactic; you can decide to end the battle here and now by fleeing.";;;;;;;;;x

column2: A quick succession of strikes to your enemy's vital regions and head would decide the battle quickly, but you open yourself up to a hazardous counterattack.

column1: EVTTOOLTIPBduel.2;"A routine strike at the torso region would be an all-round safe move; both for you and your opponent as it is easily anticipated and recovered from.";;;;;;;;;x

column2: If you attempt to cripple your opponent by hitting their arms and legs, you can end the fight without blood being spilled. However, it is considered very risky with a small chance of success.

column1: EVTTOOLTIPDduel.2;"Whether by necessity or as part of a clever tactic; you can decide to end the battle here and now by fleeing.";;;;;;;;;x

column2: You will decide your next action.

The avatar [From.GetFirstName] fires sharp discs of ice, rapid bursts of flame, big boulders and powerful winds against you. Between the attacks you try to counter but are almost overwhelmed until a chance presents itself!

The avatar [From.GetFirstName] fires sharp discs of ice, rapid bursts of flame, big boulders and powerful winds against you. Between the attacks you try to counter but are almost overwhelmed until a chance presents itself!
You decide on your next move.
Unity through strength! Strength through unity!
As master of all four elements you have all the power in the world at your disposal. How you decide to use it determines which avatar you are.
The skies and wind shall grant me victory!
A wave of air and strong wind will be thrown towards your opponent.
Rocks, stones and boulders shall grant me strength!
The ground will shake and rocks will be thrown towards your opponent.
The ancient element of the dragons will grant me victory!
Shots of fire will be fired towards your opponent.
My connection with the Moon Spirit will grant me victory!
A wave of water and discs of ice will the thrown at your opponent.
Confront Ruler
Confront [Root.GetTitledName] about [Root.GetHerHis] occupation of land that doesn't belong to [Root.GetHerHim].

The old Avatar is no longer among us and the search has started for the new avatar. The Avatar is the bridge between the two worlds and is the keeper of balance in the world. Maybe I should search for the Avatar?
I shall make the preparations!
You will try your best to start your journey.
Others will find the Avatar before me.
Able men have agreed to follow you on your quest, no doubt in the hope of the glory of finding the avatar. Food and water has been arranged and now there is only to decide where to begin the search.
The Fire Nation is where we will search!
You begin your search at the Fire Nation, but beware, you might stumble across ancient ruins, strange animals and dangerous waters.
I will be looking at the Air Temples!
You begin your search at the Air Nation, but beware, you might stumble across treacherous mountain passes, strange animals and hostile inhabitants.
The Water Tribes is the obvious target!
You begin your search at the Water Tribes, but beware, you might stumble across angry spirits, biting cold and unwelcoming people.
The vast Earth Kingdom is where the Avatar is!
You begin your search at the Earth Kingdom, but beware, you might get lost in the desert, encounter strange people and hostile rulers.
Reports of a child being able to bend other elements have reached you. It could be false reports to collect the reward you have set up.
It can't hurt to take a closer look.
You will scout the area where the report came from for the Avatar.
We have gotten close enough. Let's stop the search.
The search has been long and it's time to wait for the Avatar to reveal themselves.
Reports of a child being able to bend other elements have reached you. It could be false reports to collect the reward you have set up.
It can't hurt to take a closer look.
You will scout the area where the report came from for the Avatar.
We have gotten close enough. Let's stop the search.
The search has been long and it's time to wait for the Avatar to reveal themselves.
Reports of a child being able to bend other elements have reached you. It could be false reports to collect the reward you have set up.
It can't hurt to take a closer look.
You will scout the area where the report came from for the Avatar.
We have gotten close enough. Let's stop the search.
The search has been long and it's time to wait for the Avatar to reveal themselves.
Reports of a child being able to bend other elements have reached you. It could be false reports to collect the reward you have set up.
It can't hurt to take a closer look.
You will scout the area where the report came from for the Avatar.
We have gotten close enough. Let's stop the search.
The search has been long and it's time to wait for the Avatar to reveal themselves.

As you approach a humble hut, you begin to wonder if the mighty Avatar really is this close. The men you hired to come along your journey have suffered much and are hopefull that this is the place where the Avatar will be. You step inside and see a child playing. You give the child some toys, some of which belonged to the previous reincarnations. Without thinking the child plays with the correct toys. You have found the Avatar!

Your vigerous search through the countryside has finally ended. Along with your men, you quickly surround the hut. As you circle in, a child comes out along with the elders of the village, preparing to protect the Avatar from harm.
You found the Avatar!
I shall defeat and imprison the Avatar!
You will battle the Avatar!
I shall help the Avatar with this heavy burden.
The Avatar will be revealed and you shall be one of the followers.
I will quietly help the Avatar when the time is right.
You shall guide the Avatar, but the Avatar will be revealed when they are ready.
I now know the world is safe.
You will turn back home and not look back.
Despite your best efforts, no men have joined you yet and several merchants are wary giving you credit for a journey far away.
The Avatar must be found!
Then that is how it is...
The scouts' reports from the land have resulted in nothing but folk tales of children with special powers. It may be time to move on.
I shall look in another corner of the world!
Enough of this!
My guardian is a skilled bender to which my own skills can't compare. Even though I train everyday, I make little progress. Maybe I should ask [From.GetHerHim]?
I shall ask my guardian for help.
No! I don't need any help!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] is training everyday with me, but I still got some techniques to teach [From.GetHerHim].
I will teach you my techniques.
It should come naturally.
Even though I asked [From.GetFirstName] about [From.GetHerHis] techniques [From.GetSheHe] refused. Apparently I'm supposed to advance on my own...
That's disappointing...
Then I will learn it by myself!
Lately [From.GetFirstName] has devoted more and more time to teach me [From.GetHerHis] own techniques and I'm sure I'll improve soon enough!
The hard work begins now!
My ward is training hard and is striving to achieve my level of skill. Maybe I should give a helping hand?
Yes, I should help!
Maybe it's better not to...
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has noticed my hard work to reach [From.GetHerHis] level and has now offered a helping hand with achieving that goal.
I will learn from you, Sifu!
I don't need your help.
My technique is near flawless and control over my element is increasing. Even though I've improved, it's clear my guardian is still better.
Maybe I could learn this special technique you have?
It seems like too much work...
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has showed increased interest in my specialised technique and now wants to learn it. It's a difficult technique and maybe too difficult for [From.GetHerHim]?
It's too dangerous!
I will show [From.GetHerHim].
My [GetFromRelation] is a brilliant bender, but unfortunately [From.GetSheHe] deemed it too dangerous for me...
Perhaps it is for the better...
My [GetFromRelation] is a brilliant bender and [From.GetSheHe] deemed me ready to try one of the most advanced techniques [From.GetSheHe] knows.
Yay!

I'm beyond dispute a skilled bender and my understanding of my element is growing day by day. Today I worked on a new advanced technique I came up with myself and it seems like it is working beyond belief!
This is only the beginning!
A very good friend of mine has developed a very advanced technique and is boasting of the feat.
I should ask for help with achieving the same thing!
It's exaggerated!
After many setbacks and bruises I finally have something to show for it. My bending technique is smoother and control of my element stronger.
I've improved!
I've suffered many bruises and setbacks in pursuit of improving my bending. Despite of all my hard work I've got nothing to show for it.
All that work... for nothing...
My friend is an excellent bender and is one of the few I know who have specialised and developed a certain kind of bending.
I will ask for help with my technique!
I can make it on my own!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has long admired my bending ability and has finally asked for my help.
I will help for free!
Perhaps a small compensation for the danger?
It's no concern of mine.
I asked [From.GetFirstName] for help with learning such an advanced move and [From.GetSheHe] agreed to help me.
Let the learning begin!
I asked [From.GetFirstName] for help with learning such an advanced move and [From.GetSheHe] agreed to help me for a price.
I will accept.
That is too expensive!
I reached out to [From.GetFirstName] for help with advancing my bending but I was flat out refused. Maybe it is time to rethink our friendship?
Maybe [From.GetSheHe] isn't my friend.
This shouldn't come between us!
Even though I'm no longer young, my knowledge and power have been growing steadily. Maybe I should focus my energy on a special sort of bending?
I will learn a new technique!
I already know enough.
As the seasons go by and my lifetime comes closer to its end, the new generation should take over. My strength has been weakened and now it is time for the children to take over.
I accept my own weaknesses.
Even though my journey to find the Avatar has been long and tiresome, the Avatar has now been revealed to the world. Now there is nothing else to do than to go home again.
It just wasn't supposed to be me...
Have [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] try to improve your standing with the Spirits.
Angry Spirits
Enraged Spirits haunt this province.
Appeased Spirits
Spirits live in harmony with the inhabitants of this province.
A traditional hunt for the upper class in the Earth Kingdom. An important occasion for a liege to meet with his smaller lords and discuss important matters.
Spiritual Celebration

The bond between the Spirit World and the physical world has for as long as anyone can remember, been important for the balance of the all living things. This bond should be celebrated with a huge feast.
Spirit Feast
Feast celebrating the bond with the Spirit World.
Raiding Feast
Holding Raiding Feast
A magnificent feast  to celebrate the recent plundering.
A magnificent feast  to celebrate the recent plundering.
The Spirits are appeased
The Spirits have been appeased.
I should tell my liege!
My faithful [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] has been working hard with establishing contact to the spirits. Finally the Spirits have emerged and harmony has been restored to the province.
Harmony at last!

You have received a visitor - an emissary from the famous university of Ba Sing Se. He tells of you of the research and other work they do there and offers you a formal invitation to visit and see this marvel of the Earth Kingdom.
Interesting - I will accept the invitation.
I don't have the time.
University of Ba Sing Se

You have arrived at the magnificent University of Ba Sing Se. It's a massive complex of gray brick buildings, busy with a bustle of scholars and students. You have been told that people come here from all over the Earth Kingdom and beyond in order to study and exchange ideas. The library has a huge amount of texts in every language known to man.\n\nIt's an impressive place. You don't have much time to spend here, however, so you need to decide what to do...
I have come to receive spiritual instruction.
Challenge to Agni Kai
Challenge to Agni Kai
Challenge to Agni Kai

An Agni Kai is a traditional duel between two firebenders. The two combatants meet at a traditional place the next day, at sunrise, where they will fight until one has been burnt. An Agni Kai may be called when ones honour has been violated or to resolve a dispute. Either way, it is a dangerous challenge that shouldn't be taken lightly.
Can't have fought in a duel or Agni Kai recently.
Must have disrespected you in a way.
People look down on an uneven Agni Kai.
Training
This character is training extensively to enhance their bending ability.
Employ Bender
We should always be watching for talent within our realm, and for a cost, we can invite such a capable warrior to our court.
Summon Avatar
This peasant revolt has gotten out of hand. We should summon the Avatar to restore peace to our realm before total chaos takes hold.

The legend of the Avatar's ability has not been exaggerated. Ever since arriving, [From.GetFirstName] has exceeded the highest expectations, learning in weeks what an ordinary Earthbender would take years to achieve. Though training them has consumed a great deal of your time, you feel much more  dutiful because of it.

The legend of the Avatar's ability has not been exaggerated. Ever since arriving, [From.GetFirstName] has exceeded the highest expectations, learning in weeks what an ordinary Waterbender would take years to achieve. Though training them has consumed a great deal of your time, you feel much more  dutiful because of it.

The legend of the Avatar's ability has not been exaggerated. Ever since arriving, [From.GetFirstName] has exceeded the highest expectations, learning in weeks what an ordinary Airbender would take years to achieve. Though training them has consumed a great deal of your time, you feel much more  dutiful because of it.

The legend of the Avatar's ability has not been exaggerated. Ever since arriving, [From.GetFirstName] has exceeded the highest expectations, learning in weeks what an ordinary Firebender would take years to achieve. Though training them has consumed a great deal of your time, you feel much more  dutiful because of it.

For the past few weeks, you have trained regularly with [From.GetFirstName], practising the basics of Earthbending every day. While the Avatar's progress has been slow, [From.GetSheHe] has been learning none the less. It has taken a great deal of time to instruct them, but you feel you have become more patient for it.

For the past few weeks, you have trained regularly with [From.GetFirstName], practising the basics of Waterbending every day. While the Avatar's progress has been slow, [From.GetSheHe] has been learning none the less. It has taken a great deal of time to instruct them, but you feel you have become more patient for it.

For the past few weeks, you have trained regularly with [From.GetFirstName], practising the basics of Airbending every day. While the Avatar's progress has been slow, [From.GetSheHe] has been learning none the less. It has taken a great deal of time to instruct them, but you feel you have become more patient for it.

For the past few weeks, you have trained regularly with [From.GetFirstName], practising the basics of Firebending every day. While the Avatar's progress has been slow, [From.GetSheHe] has been learning none the less. It has taken a great deal of time to instruct them, but you feel you have become more patient for it.

It seems [From.GetFirstName] doesn't quite grasp the basics of Earthbending. They are much too flighty to properly hold their ground, but that hasn't stopped them arguing with you regularly on just what the problem is. You knew teaching the Avatar would be a challenge, but this is just trying your patience.

It seems [From.GetFirstName] doesn't quite grasp the basics of Waterbending. They are much too irresponsible to understand it, but that hasn't stopped them arguing with you regularly on just what the problem is. You knew teaching the Avatar would be a challenge, but this is just trying your patience.

It seems [From.GetFirstName] doesn't quite grasp the basics of Airbending. They are much too stubborn to understand it, but that hasn't stopped them arguing with you regularly on just what the problem is. You knew teaching the Avatar would be a challenge, but this is just trying your patience.

It seems [From.GetFirstName] doesn't quite grasp the basics of Firebending. They are much too reluctant to properly create fire, but that hasn't stopped them arguing with you regularly on just what the problem is. You knew teaching the Avatar would be a challenge, but this is just trying your patience.

While you were training with [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetSheHe] became far too hasty with attempting more advanced moves, creating an avalanche that not only nearly crushed you but did a great deal of damage to the surrounding property. It is clear you will have to pay for this catastrophe.

While you were training with [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetSheHe] became far too hasty with attempting more advanced moves, creating a tsunami not not only nearly swept you away, but did a great deal of damage to a nearby village. It is clear you will have to compensate them for this catastrophe.

While you were training with [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetSheHe] became far too hasty with attempting more advanced moves, shattering several relics while attempting to Airbend indoors. It is clear you will need to have the damaged relics repaired.

While you were training with [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetSheHe] became far too hasty with attempting more advanced moves, creating a fire that not only nearly scorched you, but set fire to several surrounding fields. It is clear you will have to compensate the farmers for their ruined crops.

After a few months of training, the Avatar has gained the ability to Earthbend. True mastery will take many years and real experience, but they are clearly capable of achieving that themselves now. [From.GetFirstName] bids you farewell as [From.GetSheHe] prepares to move on, grateful for your teaching.

After a few months of training, the Avatar has gained the ability to Waterbend. True mastery will take many years and real experience, but they are clearly capable of achieving that themselves now. [From.GetFirstName] bids you farewell as [From.GetSheHe] prepares to move on, grateful for your teaching.

After a few months of training, the Avatar has gained the ability to Airbend. True mastery will take many years and real experience, but they are clearly capable of achieving that themselves now. [From.GetFirstName] bids you farewell as [From.GetSheHe] prepares to move on, grateful for your teaching.

After a few months of training, the Avatar has gained the ability to Firebend. True mastery will take many years and real experience, but they are clearly capable of achieving that themselves now. [From.GetFirstName] bids you farewell as [From.GetSheHe] prepares to move on, grateful for your teaching.

After a few disastrous months of training, the Avatar has gained the ability to Earthbend. It is clear [From.GetSheHe] has not truly mastered the ability, but that is something they'll perhaps do with real experience. While you have not always been on the best terms, [From.GetFirstName] thanks you for your teaching as they prepare to move on.

After a few disastrous months of training, the Avatar has gained the ability to Waterbend. It is clear [From.GetSheHe] has not truly mastered the ability, but that is something they'll perhaps do with real experience. While you have not always been on the best terms, [From.GetFirstName] thanks you for your teaching as they prepare to move on.

After a few disastrous months of training, the Avatar has gained the ability to Airbend. It is clear [From.GetSheHe] has not truly mastered the ability, but that is something they'll perhaps do with real experience. While you have not always been on the best terms, [From.GetFirstName] thanks you for your teaching as they prepare to move on.

After a few disastrous months of training, the Avatar has gained the ability to Firebend. It is clear [From.GetSheHe] has not truly mastered the ability, but that is something they'll perhaps do with real experience. While you have not always been on the best terms, [From.GetFirstName] thanks you for your teaching as they prepare to move on.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has asked us to intervene in an ongoing revolt and halt it without violence.
It's not my place to intervene.
I think the ruler is right.
I will resolve this issue peacefully.
The ruler must be calmed down.

Avatar [From.GetFirstName] has finally heeded our call for aid, not only arriving, but bringing the revolt's leaders with them. [From.GetSheHeCap] says that they will cease this uprising, but only if their demands for lower taxes and greater rights are met.
No, we will not bargain with peasants!
We'll agree to this compromise and lower taxes.
For whatever reason, the Avatar has not answered our calls of aid.
We'll solve this problem on our own then.

Avatar [From.GetFirstName] has finally heeded our call for aid, bringing an end to this rebellion. [From.GetSheHeCap] has managed to have the rebels agree to an amnesty, but also asked that you give them the relief they seek to prevent such future conflicts.
There will be some compromise.

Avatar [From.GetFirstName] has finally heeded our call for aid, but has decided that this conflict is a result of your greatly unjust rule. They have given you no other option but to bow to their demands to end this revolt.
I see I have no choice.
For too long, the Firelords have waged a war of aggression upon the world. The time has come to act and restore balance to the world.
I will need allies.

Word is spreading that Avatar [From.GetFirstName] has joined the war against the Fire Nation. Whether they fight for peace or perhaps vengeance for the countless Airbenders slaughtered, the Avatar may just be able to turn the tide of this war against the Firelord.

Word is spreading that Avatar [From.GetFirstName] has finally joined the war against the Fire Nation. The Avatar's power might just be what turns the tide of war against the Firelord and restores balance to the world.
Perhaps soon this war will be over...
The Avatar will not stop the Fire Nation!
Something needs to be done about the Fire Nation's ruthless expansion. I must take action.
I must aid those already conquered!
I must find allies!
I will take the war to the Fire Nation!

A rebellion has flared up in one of the occupied provinces. Reports from local commanders suggest that the province had recently been visited by the Avatar, who seems to have inspired this doomed uprising.
We'll put this rebellion down.
The strong metal from my surroundings will strengthen me!
A cascade of metal will be flung towards your opponent. Hopefully trapping [From.GetHerHim] in the resilient element.
My opponent will not be able to withstand my force!
A powerful surge of fire will be fired towards your opponent. This carries a great risk of killing the target. If you miss this could allow your opponent to strike back.
My terrifying bolt of lightning will end this!
A surge of lightning will be fired from your fingertips towards your opponent. Killing or wounding the target is more than likely, but if you miss this could allow your opponent to strike back.
I shall use one of the darkest secrets...
An attempt to control your opponents limbs and movements will be made. If successful a capture is almost guaranteed, but if it fails you will have shown your hand and exposed yourself.
A sandstorm is coming!
A whirlwind of sand and dust will surround you. Sand is hard to kill or wound with, but the confusion may allow yourself for an easy capture.
I shall open the earth and reveal its true power!
An manipulation of the earth will hopefully trap your opponent, but it could just as easy make you a possible target.
See if you can breath without air...
Bending the air out of someone is a cruel practise, with a high risk of killing the victim rather than capturing. If you fail you are left exposed.
Declined Duel
A mark of your defeat is fitting!

I have been challenged to an Agni Kai, a meeting of fire, by [From.GetFirstName]. Rejecting one is generally seen as cowardly and might make you seem unfit to rule. However, accepting an Agni Kai and losing could result in a fiery death, or worse, horrible bodily mutilation which you have to carry for the rest of your life, forever showing your shame to the world.
The Agni Kai will commence at both parties' earliest convenience.
The Agni Kai will not commence, and you are humiliated.
I have been challenged to an Agni Kai by [From.GetFirstName]. As is customary by Fire Nation tradition, the challenged party is allowed to take the first strike.
The Agni Kai is still without clear victor and loser. I must press on against my opponent.
After the first strike, I am now allowed to retaliate however I see fit.
The Agni Kai is still without clear victor and loser. I must press on against my opponent.
My opponent [From.GetFirstName] has cowardly refused my challenge for an Agni Kai.
A shameful display!
My opponent will live in dishonour for a long time.
Teach lightningbending
Teach lightningbending
Teach lightningbending
As a lightningbender, it is my privilege to teach others about the difficult techniques of lightningbending.
Haven't been trained before.
Teach metalbending
Teach metalbending
Teach metalbending
Spreading the knowlegde of bending the metals is vital for this new technique to survive.
Haven't been trained before.
Teach bloodbending
Teach bloodbending
Teach bloodbending
Even though it is looked down upon, bloodbending is a powerful technique which could give a vital edge in any fight.
Haven't been trained before.
Haven't given bloodbending up.
Teach combustionbending
Teach combustionbending
Teach combustionbending
It is a dangerous and difficult technique to teach. I will have to consider this carefully.
Haven't been trained before.
Spread lightningbending
As ruler I have the authority to issue a decree to learn other firebenders to learn lightningbending.
Stop Bloodbending
After serious thinking, I have come to the conclusion that I'm going to give up bloodbending all toghether
You have chosen to go out to try and find an ostrich horse, either for a mount or a kill.
As you draw near, you see it, a wild ostrich horse! Now should I try to tame it or perhaps slay it?
Ok
I will be glorious on it as my mount
It will for sure improve my honour if I slay the beast
I need to get out of here, this could turn out ugly
Search for an Ostrich Horse
Search for an Ostrich Horse, a common mount and pack animal in the Earth Kingdom.

The nature of the Avatar Cycle is mysterious, and most mysterious is the constant presence of the Avatar's animal guide. At some point, almost every Avatar has been accompanied by such a companion, ranging from common animal to untamable beasts. Now, you have found such a friend.
A friend is welcome.
With the power of Earthbending, you were able to demolish the enemy's fortifications, inflicting damage to both their numbers and morale.
An enemy Earthbender has collapsed a wall, killing the men defending it and disheartening many more.
Hong Loyalists
On Journey
This character is away from home, traveling across the world.
Exile
This character is no longer actively involved with the wider world, keeping to themselves and out of politics.
Disinherited
This character is a disgrace, not fit to inherit anything.
Honourable
This character tries their best to be honourable and just.
Virtuous
This character is wise and virtuous, aspiring to do good instead of evil.
Unjust
This character is severely unjust, caring not for others, but only for their personal ambitions.
Dishonourable
This character has no honour, and will stop at nothing to get want they want.
Conqueror
This character is someone willing to crush others beneath them, and inflict suffering on a mass scale if it benefits them.
Tyrannical
This character is tyrannical, caring not even for those loyal to them. All they desire is more.
Irredeemable
This character has committed terrible atrocities and is truly irredeemable.
Dislikes Decision
Nomad Festival
It is time to appreciate our nomadic roots and venture out far from our home, to better connect as a people and further our connection to the world, and have some fun of course.
Embrace Pacifism

For a while, I have been told there is no intrinsic value to life, but I come to have doubts. Surely, is life is so precious, so special, then is that not worth preserving? Is it right to take another's life? Perhaps my heart demands I take the path of pacifism...
Embrace Nihilism

From all I have seen and learned, life is such a fragile thing, one must ask what is the point of it. Recently, I have met a few well spoken philosophers who think the same way. Perhaps they could lend me a few insights into their wisdom?

Ever since your coronation, you have been sleeping soundly. You've been the among the few to be Firelord and not descended from the Hong's who founded the Nation. You wonder if House [Root.GetDynName] will last just as long.
I'm sure we will.

Recently, your dreams have taken a turn for the worse. The nightmares now haunt you not only in sleep, but throughout the day. You cannot remember what troubles you, but you cannot help but feel something terrible is coming.
Bah, just bad dreams.
You wake up sweating, still in a state of terror. The memory of your dream is still fresh in your mind, a faceless creature looming over you...
I'm not scared of some bad dreams...
I must see a Sage at once!

As you find no answer to your questions, the nightmares drag on. Now, you realise the court has become terrified of you and your ever worsening condition. You can't hear them, but surely in the shadows, they whisper that you've gone mad.
I'm not crazy! I'm not!

As the days drag on, you no longer even remember the nightmares upon waking, but your madness grows all the same. Apparently, rumours abound of Dark Spirits roaming the night now just beyond the Capital. Rumours grow too that your rule is cursed.
They can whisper all they want...
Banish all the traitors!

Terror has spread throughout the Capital as sightings of Dark Spirits grow in number. People whisper that they steal children in the night, and so far, the city guard have been powerless to stop them.
What kind of evil creatures are these?
As the Dark Spirits continue to sow terror, people are fleeing the Capital in droves into, heading for the countryside. Even the Ministers and the members of the Imperial Guard have begun to flee.
Let the cowards run!
Shut the gates! Nobody leaves me!

Word has come that some upstart child has claimed to be a long lost descendant of House Hong and therefore claims to be the rightful Firelord. As much as you've spent hours laughing, your courtiers continue to insist that their supporters are growing in numbers.
I'm still laughing, but go ahead and kill them.

Recently, Firelord [From.GetFirstName] has been behaving extremely erratically. Some even say our ruler has even gone mad, whispering and babbling about spirits and traitors. Whatever it is, it may lead our nation to ruin unless this is stopped.
This is concerning...

Our Firelord has certainly gone mad and now news is spreading that not only is the Capital in chaos, but a young member of House Hong is leading a rebellion to reclaim the throne. We must choose whether our loyalties lie to our Firelord or to this upstart.
Our loyalty is to the Firelord!
We must help the Prince restore sanity!
The very next night, you meet with the Fire Sages in the Capital Temple. They assure you they will look into any Spiritual disturbances that may be going on, but until then, they advise you to rest.
I am grateful for their help.

A Fire Sage has finally replied to your request for aid. Apparently, he believes that your unease may be caused by Spiritual disturbance in the Capital. He requests your permission to accompany you into the Dragonbone Catacombs to find the source of this trouble.
Into the Catacombs? I'm not going down there!
Let us go then.

Journeying into the Catacombs, tomb of all Firelords before you, the Sage comes across legends of the time before the Fire Nation. The tale speaks of Dark Spirits known as Kemurikage who sowed terror among the warlords, scattering their petty kingdoms to the winds.
Fascinating...

When the first Firelord united the islands, the Kemurikage retreated into the Spirit World as the conflict that spawned them ended. Now however, with the line of the first Firelord ended, they have returned to restore balance.
Great Spirits, how may I appease you?
I'm leaving, this is a fool's tale.

The Sage begins a ritual to try and catch the attention of these Spirits, but pleads with you to take absolute caution when dealing with such entities. He warns you a wicked soul may incur their wraith.
Summon them.
I should leave.

The Spirits are angered by your presence, and they attack. They descend upon you, their lifeless eyes gazing into you. You wake up in the Royal Chambers. Nobody has heard of what happened, and you're left unsure if it even happened at all.
It's all just a dream. Hahahaha...

The Spirits arrive, and after a moment studying you, seem contented, disappearing as fast as they appeared. The Sage is unsure if they are appeased, but believes that something will change. You leave the Catacombs behind, hoping something came of this.
Hopefully this is over.
After a month, you have no longer been having any troubling dreams as of late. There has been no more disturbances, and it appears this Spiritual crisis is over.
What a relief.

A traveller recently arrived in [Root.Capital.GetName]. It appears that this wanderer is a Waterbending Healer, by the name of [From.GetFirstName] and has been healing local residents. Perhaps [From.GetSheHe] could stay as our Healer?
Recently, [Root.GetBestName], has talked repeatedly with me about [From.Religion.GetName]. It is clear that he wishes me to adapt a similar way of thinking, and admissibly, I feel like I should.
Then maybe it is the right way of thinking.
No, I think I prefer my ways for now.
Earth Kingdom Upkeep
Recently, [From.GetName], has visited your home on [From.GetHerHis] journeys. Though they have stayed only a few short weeks, you can tell something is quickly growing between the two of you.
I think I'm in love!
No, it's not appropriate.

For the past few weeks, [FromFrom.GetBestName] has been visiting your province, and now, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] and [From.GetBestName] has come before you and asked permission to marry. You were not aware there was something brewing between the two, but both seem quite certain of their love.
I will allow it.
I cannot allow it.
Recently, you received a visitor, one [From.GetBestName]. It appears [From.GetSheHe] is looking for a new employer, and has come to ask permission to join your court.
Of course there is room for you.
There is no place for you here.
It appears [FromFrom.GetBestName] has decided to leaving home, setting off to join [From.GetBestName]'s court.
[From.GetBestName] will be missed.
Word has come that Avatar [From.GetFirstName] is coming to our aid in our struggle, bringing allies to our defence!
I dare hope this may be enough to save us.

Our commanders are reporting that reinforcements are coming to the aid of our enemies, led by none other than Avatar [From.GetFirstName]. It appears the Avatar has rallied others to [From.GetHerHis] cause in [From.GetHerHis] efforts against us.
[From.GetSheHeCap] cannot hope to halt our entire army...

With the death of [From.GetFirstName], you know yet more sorrow. You also feel the burning desire for revenge, knowing your dear [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] was murdered by [FromFrom.GetBestName]. For this crime, there must be punishment.
Avatar Found?
We must train them
The proper authorities should be informed
They're not the Avatar!

There is a thundering crash, as Avatar [From.GetFirstName] intrudes into your throne room with eyes burning bright. With terrifying power, they hover over you as your guards flee in fear. There are no words, but you know, they have come to avenge [FromFrom.GetBestName].
Word has come to you, that the vile [FromFrom.GetBestName] has abducted your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName]. This barbarity must not go unavenged.

There is a thundering crash, as Avatar [From.GetFirstName] intrudes into your throne room with eyes burning bright. With terrifying power, they hover over you as your guards flee in fear. There are no words, but you know, they have come to rescue [FromFrom.GetBestName]
My vengeance will be swift.
As Avatar, I must restrain myself, for my own sake.
If I must kill you, Avatar, then I shall!
Avatar, I beg for mercy!
MERCY PLEASE!!!
Duellers have NOT recently fought before
Pirate Governor
Pirate Governors
Captain
Seized County
Earth Kingdom Outpost
Earth Kingdom Outposts
Earth Kingdom Province
Earth Kingdom Provinces
Your regent is ZGrand Secretariat of Dai Li!
ZEarth Kingdom! is RDisbanded!
Tea Shop
Tea House
Jasmine Dragon Tea House
A humble tea shop in the middle of town, generating revenue from the gentler folk.
An elaborate tea house, with beautifully carved statues and a fountain.
A branch of the famous franchise, from the heart of Ba Sing Se!
Administrative
The internal hierarchy of the Earth Kingdom.
Anarchy
With very little in the way of hierarchy, the Earth Kingdom finds it difficult to court its own lands.
Burgeoning
Though not yet commanding full respect from their subjects, Earth Monarchs are able to pass off at least rudimentary duties to appointed councillors.
Stable
Still expanding, enough stability has been brought to the Kingdom that fewer and fewer despise the would-be Kings as oppressors.
Balanced
Finally reaching equilibrium, enough positions in the Earth Kingdom's hierarchy have been filled that the monarchs may finally tend to their own lands.
Pre-Monarchy
Although not in complete control, the Monarch is considerably more powerful
column3: the more conniving of court see the writing on the wall, and begin to curry their lord's favour.

column2: Earth Monarchism
Blessed with the Divine Right to rule, Earth Monarchs control vast swathes of Ba Sing Se, and command a great deal of adoration from their courts.
Bureaucracy
Laws that govern taxes and vassal limits.
Anarchy
With very little influence over his subjects, the Earth Kingdom severely struggles with collecting taxes.
Underfunded
Paying some effort to organise their system, the Earth Kingdom develops a working, though clunky, bureaucratic system.
Balanced
After some time of pushing their influence, the line of Earth Kings have established a bureaucratic system capable of properly managing the taxes of the Kingdom.
Efficient
Finding new ways to stream-line out-of-date processes, the bureaucracy of the Earth Kingdom manages to squeeze just a few more tithes out of its subjects.
Cultural
Having ingrained into the culture itself, the Earth Kingdom's bureaucracy carries a massive amount of respect, and even finds imitators among the lesser kingdoms.
Absolute Efficiency
Running as a well-oiled machine, the Earth Kingdom enjoys plentiful taxes from its subjects, and an outstandingly efficient bureaucratic system.
Levies
Three Banners Reform
Balanced
Retinues
Standing Army
Professional Army
Status of Earth Kingdom Army
Status of Unified System of Law
Non-Existing Unified System of Law
Autonomous System of Law
Territorial System of Law
Balanced System of Law
Slightly Centralised System of Law
Centralised System of Law
Outposts
To begin the reunification of their lands, the Earth Kingdom starts by bringing territories closer to Ba Sing Se back into the fold.
All territories in the northern Earth Kingdom will be made into tributaries.
Y3! Royal Authority gain yearly. All de jure Earth Kingdom tributaries will be forced to choose between annexation or independence.
Y1! Royal Authority gain yearly. Allows annexations of tributes based on current Earth Kingdom unity laws
Y0! Royal Authority gain yearly from this law.

Y0! Royal Authority gain yearly from this law. Allows ordering county/duchy tributes to join their de jure existing kingdom title when states laws is adopted / Allows ordering county tributes to join their de jure existing duchy title when territories laws is adopted.
Y-1! Royal Authority gain yearly from this law.
Y-3! Royal Authority gain yearly from this law.
Blue Flames
Both intimidating and powerful, some Firebenders can make their fire so hot that they produce blue flames.
Unity
The internal cohesion of the Earth Kingdom.

You arrive in the Earth Kingdom and are in awe of the vast expanses, much different from the home you grew up in. You meet various people on your journey, all of them different from each other and potential allies in the future. Your search continues until you hear about an Earthbending master.

You arrive in the Fire Nation, experiencing the warm climate in view of it's tropical volcanic landscape. You make your way through various settlements, interacting with the general populace until you hear about a Firebending master.

You arrive in one of the Water Tribes, the ocean stretching as far as the eye could see from the shores. You venture through the cold climate, taking refuge in settlements during long nights. You meet various people on your journey, all of them different from each other and potential allies in the future. Your search continues until you hear about Waterbending master.
I think I found the one...
The training field shakes and rumbles as you and your master engage in an intense training session. You struggle at times to hold your own against your master but progress has been made.
The bruises are still healing

You commit yourself to training with your master. Following a brutal training session in which you are pushed to the absolute limits of your ability you collapse from exhaustion after completing your master's tests. Your master approaches and says: "You have learned all that I can teach you." You and your master bow to each other and soon, you set off to find your next master.
To the next nation

You travel over the vast landmasses and sights. An assortment of people pepper your journey, from the quirky to the downright strange. As time passes, your journey progresses further and soon, you are in search of your next master.
I'm almost to the Earth Kingdom
There should be an Air Temple near here...
All I see is more and more water!
I can already feel the heat from the Fire Nation!
After years of work, you have mastered all four elements. News has spread fast of your mastery of the elements, and people are recognising your authority as Avatar.
I am a worthy Avatar
Must be an already known Guru.
Royal Sage
Must be at least a competent bender.
War of Expansion
We can fulfil our promise to expand our realm through military means.
War of Expansion
Five Years Conquest
Expand your Realm

[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to make [This.GetHerHis] realm into something future generations can be proud of. While this ambition is active, you will be able to freely wage war for any county and must double the size of your realm in five years.
Rule over M[Root.realmSizeGoal.GetValue]! holdings
Increase Realm Zeal
We must not only embrace the new way, but invest in spreading it amongst the common people so that all may benefit. All citizens of the Fire Nation should know fire is the superior element!
Rule strong for five years and never bring dishonour upon yourself with defeat.
Promote Spiritualism

We must stop this terrible abandonment of our oldest and most sacred traditions. We need to invest in ensuring that the old ways are not forgotten, and embrace the path of balance over the devastation the Imperialists would bring us.
Rule strong for five years and stay clear of conflict.
This action will lower your karma (K5!)
Host Grand Market

We can choose to host a grand market within our capital province, bringing merchants from far and wide to trade their wares. Here, we might secure preferential deals for our holdings, or go searching for rare and powerful artefacts to purchase...

After long preparation, market day has arrived, bringing countless merchants from far and wide to your capital. There are merchants here selling goods and wares from all different nations. With so much on offer, perhaps you should browse their wares yourself.
I will haggle for the best deals...
It's been a while since I restocked the Armoury...
I believe I spy some hidden treasures.
We should reap long term benefits from this...
After hours of searching, your luck has you come across a trader selling rare and certainly well crafted weapons. A few catch your eye, definitely no doubt worthwhile purchases.
Duel Dao Blades may be hard to master, but are deadly in battle.
This sword is clearly fit for a master.
This club definitely looks like a sturdy tool.
Nothing here seems worth the price though.
I could do with a new spear.

In your search, you find a representative from a smith's guild in a neighbouring province. For quite a low price, he'd be willing to make a deal for a significant quantity of weapons and armour to be supplied to your troops, delivered over the coming few years.
A surplus of arms is what we need.
I have no interest in expanding the arsenal.
Your search brings you across a trader selling ordinary, if not mundane, weapons. They all appear to be of solid craftsmanship however, and you notice a few items of interest.
An Axe would come in handy in battle.
This seems like a fine sword.
I could take up Archery, I think.
None of these weapons are worthy.
After hours of exasperating searching, you finally come to the conclusion there is nothing here worth your time. Maybe there will be something of interest another year.
How frustrating!

You find a Smith, one who does not craft common weapons of war, but ceremonial weapons much more fitting for one of high station, such as yourself. All the weapons present are clearly of excellent craftsmanship and beauty.
This Dagger is clearly a work of art.
A ceremonial dagger will do.
This Axe is quite intriguing.
There is nothing of practical use here.

After a long time searching, you come across a merchant selling the most rare and magnificent weapons, everything from masterfully crafted bows to a sword the merchant claims to have been forged out of metal that fell from the Heavens.
I must have that Sword!
This weapon will come in handy.
This Bow will do fine.
Far too expensive for my taste.

In your search, you find a merchant selling a vast array of medicines and ointments. He tells you he would be willing to enter a deal to deliver you a constant supply, enough for not only yourself but to heighten public health across the province.
A worthy investment.
I have no need of these Vulture-Snake Oils.

Among the various merchants and traders, you manage to make new contacts among suppliers of goods and materials. In particular, the opportunity to make a deal for a great deal of construction materials arises, something that would make any future projects in your capital much faster and cheaper.
This seems to be a worthwhile deal.
I have no plans for building anything at this moment.

You always fancied yourself quite knowledgeable of money and business, you find the opportunity to purchase a large sum of trade goods from one of the visiting merchants. While a risky investment, it may pay off it's price.
We'll see if this pays off.
I've no interest in this.
After sometime wandering, you come across a merchant selling many books from far and wide. There are a great deal of books, but you spot a few of special interest.
This is a worthy choice.
I could do with something more practical.
This could be of some use.
I have no interest in any of these.

You seem to be in luck when you come across a merchant selling fabulous jewellery and relics to wealthy nobles. He has a few items that might interest you, magnificent treasures he has found from across the world.
This crown is magnificent.
This a crown worthy of my status.
These Bracelets will be a fine addition.
This is all to unnecessary.

You happen to come across a much stranger merchant, selling no single thing, but an assortment of items, from old faded books to jewellery. The prices seem quite high, but some items appear to be of interest.
This book seems like a worthwhile purchase.
This Bracelet seems interesting!
This Crown will do.
Nothing here is worth buying.
Arms Surplus
Hosted Grand Market
Medical Supplies
Building Supplies
Trade Goods
you find a merchant selling rare treasures.
you find a seller of construction materials.
you find a merchant of medicine.
you find a merchant selling unique artefacts.
you find a seller of antique books.
you find a seller of trade goods.
you find a renowned Smith.
you find a Smith.
you find a trader of rare weapons.
you find an arms trader.
you find a trader.
your search fails to find anything.
Convert Religion
Convert to [Root.GetPossPronoun] [Root.Religion.GetName] Faith
I am sure Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]! would be pleased if we had the same faith...
column3: Nul doute que m[Root.Liege.GetOnA] [Root.Liege.GetLordLady] lige apprcierait que nous partagions la mme foi...
column4: Ich bin sicher, dass Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]! erfreut wre, wenn wir denselben Glauben htten ...
column6: Seguro que a mi seor le complacer que tengamos la misma fe...

column2: Convert Culture
Convert to [Root.GetPossPronoun] [Root.Culture.GetName] Culture
I am impressed with the dialect and customs of my liege. I wish I were like that...
column3: La langue et les coutumes de m[Root.Liege.GetOnA] [Root.Liege.GetLordLady] lige m'impressionnent. J'aimerais les adopter...
column4: Ich bin von der Sprache und den Bruchen meines Lehnsherrn beeindruckt. Ich wnschte, ich wre auch so ...
column6: Me impresiona el lenguaje y las costumbres de mi seor. Ojal yo tambin pudiera ser as...

column2: Abandon Heresy
I will rejoin the correct interpretation of my faith.
Convert to Attacker's Religion
column6: Convertir a la Religin del Atacante

column2: We are currently under attack for religious reasons. If I accept conversion, I can end this war now and protect my people...
column3: Nous sommes prsentement attaqus pour des raisons religieuses. Si j'accepte la conversion, je pourrai mettre fin  cette guerre et protger mon peuple...
column4: Wir werden aus religisen Grnden angegriffen. Wenn ich der Konvertierung zustimme, kann ich den Krieg sofort beenden und mein Volk schtzen...
column6: En estos momentos estamos bajo ataque por motivos religiosos. Si acepto la conversin, puedo terminar esta guerra y proteger a mi pueblo...

column2: Convert to Local Culture ([Root.Capital.Culture.GetName])
I catch myself using [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] slang all the time. I govern the [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] people of [Root.Capital.GetName], but am I truly one of them?
column3: Je me surprends  penser en langue [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] constamment. Je rgne sur le peuple [Root.Capital.GetCultureMasc] de [Root.Capital.GetName], mais suis-je rellement l'un[Root.Get_E] des leurs?
column4: Ich ertappe mich stndig dabei, meine Gedanken in der [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]en Sprache zu formulieren. Ich regiere die [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName]en Menschen aus [Root.Capital.GetName], aber bin ich wahrhaftig einer von ihnen?
column6: Me sorprendo a m mismo pensando en el idioma [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] todo el tiempo. Yo gobierno a los [Root.Capital.Culture.GetName] gente de [Root.Capital.GetName], pero en realidad, soy uno de ellos?

column2: Convert to Local Religion ([Root.Capital.Religion.GetName])

The Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetName]! people in Y[Root.Capital.GetName]! impress me with the depth and passion of their faith. I am tempted to convert and embrace the glory of Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!...
column3: Les habitants Y[Root.Capital.GetReligionMascPl]! de Y[Root.Capital.GetName]! m'impressionnent par la profondeur et la passion avec laquelle ils vivent leur foi. J'envisage de me convertir et de faire mienne la gloire [Root.Capital.Get_du_HighGod].
column4: Die Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetName]en! Menschen in Y[Root.Capital.GetName]! beeindrucken mich durch die Tiefe und die Leidenschaft ihres Glaubens. Ich bin versucht, zu konvertieren und Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetRandomGodName]! zu preisen...
column6: La gente Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetName]! de Y[Root.Capital.GetName]! me impresiona con la profundidad y la pasin de su fe. Estoy tentado a convertirme y abrazar la gloria de Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!...

column2: Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]! becomes Y[Root.Capital.Religion.GetName]!.
